From: Saber Khalfallah <jira@dnext.atlassian.net>
Sent: 31 July 2025 10:11
To: Elfi Middelbeek <elfi.middelbeek@dnext.io>
Subject: DCS-1561 RE: Platform access - dnexr

Reply above this line.

Hello,

Could you please clarify exactly which resources he needs? If he only requires specific resources from DNEXR, we can share those directly on the stage. Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah Customer Support
